title: Build Skill11 Fantasy MVP - Low-Entry Cricket Fantasy Sports Platform

requirements.text: Implement user registration and authentication system using Internet Identity integration allowing users to create accounts and securely log in to the platform
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register new accounts via Internet Identity
Users can log in securely using Internet Identity
User sessions persist across app usage
Backend stores user profiles with wallet balance initialized to ₹0

requirements.text: Create IPL match listing feature displaying upcoming and live IPL matches with match details (teams, venue, date/time) and real-time score updates
acceptanceCriteria: Display list of upcoming IPL matches with team names, logos, venue, and scheduled time
Show live matches with real-time score updates
Match data persists in backend storage
Users can view match details by selecting a match

requirements.text: Build fantasy team creation interface allowing users to select 11 players (1-4 wicketkeepers, 3-6 batsmen, 1-4 all-rounders, 3-6 bowlers) from the two competing teams within a 100-credit budget, and designate a captain (2x points) and vice-captain (1.5x points)
acceptanceCriteria: UI displays player list categorized by role with credit values
Users can select exactly 11 players within role constraints
Total credits must not exceed 100
Users must select 1 captain and 1 vice-captain
Selected team is saved to backend linked to user and match
Users can edit team until match start time

requirements.text: Implement contest entry system displaying available low-entry contests (₹10–₹100 entry fees) for each match, showing prize pool, entry fee, total spots, and spots filled, allowing users to join contests with their created teams
acceptanceCriteria: Display list of contests for each match filtered to ₹10–₹100 entry range
Show contest details: entry fee, prize pool, total spots, filled spots
Users can join a contest if they have sufficient wallet balance
Entry fee is deducted from user wallet upon joining
Backend validates wallet balance before confirming entry
Users cannot join same contest multiple times with same team

requirements.text: Integrate payment gateway (Stripe) for users to add funds to their wallet, supporting deposits in ₹10–₹10,000 range with secure transaction processing
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate wallet recharge from app interface
Stripe payment flow handles secure payment processing
Successful payments credit user wallet balance immediately
Transaction history is recorded in backend
Failed transactions do not modify wallet balance

requirements.text: Build scoring engine that calculates fantasy points for each player based on cricket performance metrics (runs, wickets, catches, run-outs, strike rate, economy rate) and updates user team scores in real-time during live matches
acceptanceCriteria: Backend defines point scoring rules for batting, bowling, and fielding actions
Captain receives 2x points, vice-captain receives 1.5x points
Player scores update as match progresses
User team total score is calculated by summing all player points with multipliers
Scores are persisted and queryable by frontend

requirements.text: Create leaderboard interface showing real-time rankings of all teams in a contest sorted by fantasy points, displaying team name, rank, and total points, with final results declaring winners when match concludes
acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard displays all teams in contest ranked by total points
Rankings update in real-time during live matches
Final rankings are locked when match ends
Winners are highlighted with prize amounts
Users can view their own rank and score

requirements.text: Implement wallet system for managing user balance, tracking deposits, contest entry deductions, and winnings credits, with transaction history viewable by users
acceptanceCriteria: Backend maintains wallet balance for each user
Deposits add to wallet balance
Contest entries deduct from wallet balance
Contest winnings credit to wallet balance automatically
Users can view current balance in app
Users can view transaction history with timestamps and amounts
Wallet balance never goes negative

requirements.text: Design a mobile-first, cohesive visual theme with vibrant sports-inspired colors (avoiding blue and purple), bold typography for headers and scores, clean card-based layouts for matches and contests, and energetic UI elements that convey excitement and competition throughout the application
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme uses sports-inspired color palette (e.g., greens, oranges, reds) consistently
Typography hierarchy is clear with bold fonts for important data
Layout is optimized for mobile screens with touch-friendly controls
UI components follow consistent design patterns across all screens
Design conveys energy and competitive spirit appropriate for fantasy sports

constraints: Entry fees must be restricted to ₹10–₹100 range only
Platform focuses exclusively on cricket initially, starting with IPL matches
Must use Internet Identity for authentication (no third-party social login)
Must use Stripe for payment processing
All monetary values must be handled in Indian Rupees (₹)
Team creation must enforce cricket fantasy rules: 11 players, role constraints, 100-credit budget, 1 captain, 1 vice-captain
nonGoals: Support for sports other than cricket in MVP
Support for cricket leagues other than IPL in initial release
Social features like chat or user profiles beyond basic account info
Advanced analytics or player statistics beyond basic scoring

required: Cricket-themed app logo with 'Skill11' branding in bold, modern font with cricket ball or bat element (skill11-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Hero banner showing energetic cricket action scene with vibrant colors suitable for mobile landing screen (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Cricket stadium background illustration with subtle crowd and field for contest cards backdrop (stadium-bg.dim_800x600.png)
Empty state illustration of cricket player with bat in ready stance for when no teams created yet (empty-team.dim_400x400.png)
Trophy icon illustration in gold/yellow for winners and prizes (trophy-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Wallet/money icon illustration for balance and transactions section (wallet-icon.dim_128x128.png)
